short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access your forghetti logins within the Chrome browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Forghetti generates mind-bogglingly complex passwords the instant you need them. All you ever need to remember is a simple doodle. Memorable, safe and stress-free.

We are different. We never save a password, we do not know your doodle and we cannot recreate it for you... so you are the only person who can generate your passwords every time.

You can draw one shape or lots of shapes... when you are done click the tick and your doodle will give you a password! Any doodle will generate a password, but when you draw YOUR doodle you get YOUR password.

Draw the same doodle and youâ€™ll get unique, brain-scramblingly complicated passwords, PIN numbers and memorable words for each login. You choose.

You only need to remember your little doodle.

Share logins with family, friends or colleagues... it is easy to share and secure to access. Never again feel the stress of not remembering the password to your favourite websites. 

Our Confoundry generates your passwords on demand when you need them. They are not saved in a database anywhere.

With every subscription to forghetti comes a commitment from us to donate towards selected charities.
